resources.string: A balanced meal with scrambled eggs, avocado, whole-grain toast, and a side of Greek yogurt for sustained energy and muscle recovery.
A mix of oatmeal, protein powder, mixed berries, and almonds, providing slow-digesting carbs and protein for morning workouts.
Lean grilled chicken, quinoa, kale, and a light vinaigrette fuel muscle growth and keep you full.
A meal rich in omega-3s and complex carbs, great for reducing inflammation and replenishing glycogen stores.
Ground turkey, brown rice, and steamed broccoli provide the perfect balance of protein, carbs, and fiber for post-workout recovery.
A quick blend of banana, protein powder, almond butter, and flaxseeds to give you a fast-absorbing post-workout meal.
A filling wrap with eggs, avocado, spinach, and whole-grain tortillas, providing essential fats and proteins.
A hearty meal with lean beef, roasted sweet potatoes, and asparagus, packed with iron and vitamins for energy.
A vegetarian muscle-building meal with tofu, mixed vegetables, and brown rice for sustained energy.
A vegetarian muscle-building meal with tofu, mixed vegetables, and brown rice for sustained energy.
